Q_DESC:
Given a string, you have to remove the three consecutive duplicates from the string. If no three are consecutive then output the string as it is.
Note: Print '-1' if string is empty.
Input:
The first line consists of an integer T i.e number of test cases. The only line of each test case consists of a string s.
Output:
Print the required output.
Constraints: 
1<=T<=200
1<=|String|<=100
TESTCASE_3:
4
aabbbaccddddc
aabbaccddc
aaabbbcccdddeeeff
jjjhhhiiikk
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
aaaccdc
aabbaccddc
ff
kk
